GR14ss4_krsu:6544: purāṇaṃ mama hṛdi prakāśitavān ity arthaḥ |
GR14ss4_krsu:6545: etac ca prathamasya spatma eva vyaktam |
GR14ss4_krsu:6546: yad yasyāṃ ca sūrayaḥ śeṣādayo'pi muhyanti svarūpa-saundarya-
GR14ss4_krsu:6547: guṇādibhiḥ atyadbhutā keyam iti nirvaktum ārabdhā niśetuṃ na śaknuvanti |
GR14ss4_krsu:6548: evaṃ bhūtvā sā yadi kṛpāṃ nākariṣyat tadā labdha-mādhava-tādṛśa-
GR14ss4_krsu:6552: ity ādinā tasyā līlā-varṇana-leśo'pi sāhasa-siddhir asau nābhaviṣyad eveti
GR14ss4_krsu:6554: tayor āścarya-rūpatvam eva vyanakti tejo-vāri-mṛdāṃ caitanyānām api yathā yena prakāreṇa vinimayaḥ parasparaṃ svabhāva-viparyayor bhavati tathā yo vibhrājita iti śeṣaḥ |
GR14ss4_krsu:6564: ujjvalatā-prāptir vaṃśī-vādyādinā vārivac ca dravatā-prāptir iti |
GR14ss4_krsu:6565: tad etat sarvaṃ tasya līlā-varṇane prasiddham eva |
GR14ss4_krsu:6566: yatra yasyāṃ ca vidyamānāyāṃ tir-dhāma-sargaḥ śrī-bhū-līleti-śakti-trayī-prādurbhāvo vā |
GR14ss4_krsu:6570: nāyikā-rūpa-tri-bhedānāṃ sarvāsām api vraja-devīnām eva prādurbhāvo vā
GR14ss4_krsu:6572: yasyāḥ saundaryādi-guṇa-sampadā tās tāḥ kṛṣṇasya na kiñcid iva prayojanam arhantīty arthaḥ
GR14ss4_krsu:6576: vā paraspara-bhinnatāṃ gatayor aikyenaiva vivakṣitaṃ tad iti |
GR14ss4_krsu:6578: kathambhūtam ? svena dhāmnā sva-sva-prabhāvena sadā nirastaṃ sva-līlā-
GR14ss4_krsu:6579: pratibandhakānāṃ jaratī-prabhṛtīnāṃ pratipakṣa-nāyikānāṃ ca kuhakaṃ māyā yena tat |
GR14ss4_krsu:6581: yad vā parasparaṃ vilāsādibhir anavaratam ānanda-sandoha-dāne kṛta-satyam iva jātam |
GR14ss4_krsu:6586: vācakatayā vākyato niridiṣṭa ity ubhaya-sādṛśyāvagamāt prativastūpamā-
GR14ss4_krsu:6589: tena tais tair guṇair mitho yogyatayā nibaddhatvāt samanāmāpi |
GR14ss4_krsu:6590: etad-alaṅkāreṇa ca aho parasparaṃ parasmāt param api tan-mithuna-bhūtaṃ kim api tattvaṃ mitho
GR14ss4_krsu:6591: guṇa-gaṇa-mādhurībhiḥ samatām eva samavāptam iti sakala-jīva-jīvātur-
GR14ss4_krsu:6593: vilāsaṃ na rocayatīti svataḥ sambhavi vastu vyajyate |
GR14ss4_krsu:6596: eko'pi dharmaḥ sāmānyo yatra nirdiśyate pṛthak || [SāhD 10.49] iti |
GR14ss4_krsu:6598: evaṃ samaṃ syād ānurūpyeṇa ślāghā yogyasya vastuna iti |
GR14ss4_krsu:6599: tathā vastu vālaṅkṛtir vāpi dvidhārthaḥ sambhavī svataḥ |
GR14ss4_krsu:6604: tad uktaṃ śrutyā - rādhayā mādhavo devaḥ ity ādinā |
GR14ss4_krsu:6607: aham eva paraṃ rūpaṃ nānyo jānāti kaścana |
GR14ss4_krsu:6608: jānāti rādhikā pārtha aṃśān arcanti devatāḥ || iti |
GR14ss4_krsu:6609: tayor nitya-vilāsas tv itthaṃ yathā varṇito'smad-upajīvya-caraṇāmbujaiḥ --
GR14ss4_krsu:6612: tad-vakṣo-ruha-citra-keli-makarī-pāṇḍitya-pāraṃ gataḥ kaiśoraṃ saphalī-karoti kalayan kuñje vihāraṃ hariḥ || iti [BRS 2.1.231] |
GR14ss4_krsu:6614: tasminn api sambandhe śrī-rādhā-mādhava-rūpeṇaiva prādurbhāvas tasya sambandhinaḥ
GR14ss4_krsu:6616: tad uktaṃ śrutyā rādhayā mādhavo deva iti |
GR14ss4_krsu:6618: artham eva vyatāniṣamimāḥ sarvā api paripāṭīr iti pūrṇaḥ sambandhaḥ |
